org.stekikun.dolmen.debug

Class Derivation.NonTerminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.debug.Derivation
      • org.stekikun.dolmen.debug.Derivation.NonTerminal
  • Enclosing class:
    Derivation

    public static final class Derivation.NonTerminal
extends Derivation
    This represents a node in a Derivation tree, i.e. the realization of some non-terminal (Derivation.symbol) in the grammar via one of its production (prod). The items for the production rule are themselves derivation trees and can be fetched with getChildren().
    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer
